Reviews: Bought a hail sale work truck Sierra truck a couple years back; price was negotiated before I got there. Showed up with check in and out; quick friendly service no games.

The dealership is very clean and well kept. However, the service is subpar. The sales team refused to recognize customer needs and were unwilling to accommodate. Had a scheduled appointment to view a vehicle and had to leave work early in order to make the appointment only to find out upon arrival that the vehicle I wanted to purchase had not arrived. No call to let me know and basically no recollection of the appointment at all. The aura reeked of arrogance.
